\w In|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w same|strong="H0853"\w* way \w with|strong="H0376"\w* \w your|strong="H0398"\w* oxen \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w your|strong="H0398"\w* sheep: \w for|strong="H3808"\w* seven days \w let|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* young \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w with|strong="H0376"\w* \w its|strong="H0853"\w* mother; \w on|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* eighth day \w give|strong="H0398"\w* \w it|strong="H0398"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w me|strong="H7993"\w*.
